premise_source_doc_sentence: Legally a French-speaking city , 60.5 % of Montrealers speak French at home , 21.2 % speak English and 19.8 % speak neither .

However , due to the spread of Legal English as the predominant language of international business , as well as its role as a legal language within the European Union , legal English is now a global phenomenon .
Thus , `` we study legal language as a kind of second language , a specialized use of vocabulary , phrases , and syntax that helps us to communicate more easily with each other '' .
